title: Propagandist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Convince someone to join the Town. They are converted into a random Town role. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Killing roles become Town (Killing). Head roles become a Town (Power). All others become any random Town role (except power).
- If you target a Townie, they are still converted and you lose your ability charge.

desc:
Post 3816
*"however i was converted" - rasen*
*"were u converted to town?" - nub*
*"i was not converted to town" - rasen*
